segments.text: Nothing much — the same old stuff . A lot of bad news as usual .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: Well , what ’ s the weather report ?
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: Sunny and mild today , cloudy and rainy tomorrow .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: Did they find those bank robbers ?
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: Not yet . They were holding two men in Ohio , but they let them go . They weren ’ t the criminals after all .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: What about the sports page ? What were the scores of last night ’ s games ?
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: Here ’ s the paper ; you can read them yourself .
segments.speaker: S2
